messages.content: This is the beginning of your conversation.
Hi! I'm interested in the 2023 BMW convertible I saw on your website. Is it still available?
Hello Frankie! Yes, that BMW is still available. It's a beautiful car with low mileage. Would you like to schedule a test drive?
That sounds perfect! What's the best time for a test drive this week?
Sounds good! We definitely have what you're looking for. How about tomorrow at 3 PM?

Hello! I saw your ad about custom car modifications. Do you do custom paint jobs?
Hi Lisa! Absolutely, we specialize in custom paint jobs. What kind of design are you thinking about?
I want something unique - maybe a galaxy theme with metallic finish. Is that possible?
That sounds incredible! We've done similar work before. I can show you some examples when you visit.
Amazing! I love so idea. I'd love to stop in and see what you can do!
This is the beginning of your conversation.
I saw your ad on Facebook! Do you still have those convertibles on the lot?
Yes we do, Cam! We have 3 still on the lot, but they're going to go fast. Did you want to come in for a test drive?
Yes, please! And while I'm at it, I'd love to schedule a customization consult.
Sure thing! The price for consultations is $99. I can send the payment link here, and then we'll get you scheduled.

conversations.name: Will Patiente
conversations.lastMessage: You: Of course! Those are the best for car...

messages.content: This is the beginning of your conversation.
Hey! I'm looking for performance upgrades for my Mustang. Do you guys do turbo installations?
Hi Will! Absolutely, we're experts in performance modifications. What year Mustang are you working with?
It's a 2020 GT. I want to add some serious power but keep it reliable for daily driving.
Of course! Those are the best for performance mods. We can do a conservative tune that adds 100+ HP safely.
